title.rendered: 40A BLDC ESC-Brushless Motor Speed Controller with Connector (Pack of 1)

content.rendered:
• 40A BLDC ESC Electronic Speed Controller is specifically made for quadcopters and multi-rotors and provides faster and better motor speed control giving better flight performance compared to other available ESCs.
  • 40A BLDC ESC ELECTRONIC SPEED CONTROLLER can drive motors which consume up to 40A current. It works on 2S-6S Lipo batteries. It has an onboard BEC which provides regulated 5V(3A max draw) to power the flight controller and other onboard modules. It can be used to control our brushless motors with a 2S-6S Lipo (make sure motor doesn’t draw more than 40A).
  • This particular ESC is recommended with A2212 brushless motor (1000kv, 1400kv, 2200kv).

excerpt.rendered:
1 X ESC: 40 Amperes

Application: Quadcopter, Airplane, Helicopters, DIY Projects
